name: cypht
description: Cypht is a lightweight, browser-based email client that supports IMAP, SMTP, and multiple accounts. It offers unified inboxes, module-based views, and customization for self-hosted or remote deployment.
features: Multi-Account Support: Manage multiple email accounts in one place. Unified inbox experience.
IMAP & SMTP: Full protocol support for sending and receiving. Universal compatibility.
Lightweight Design: Fast performance with minimal resources. Efficient email management.
Module-Based: Customize interface with modular components. Tailor to your needs.
Browser-Based: Access email from any device with a browser. No client installation.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your email interface. Privacy-focused solution.
